Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.12581207]Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633 (MIC=0.25 µM), Lactococcus garvieae ATCC 49156 (MIC=10 µM), S.iniae F-8502 (MIC=2.5 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli WT-2 (MIC=0.25 µM), Vibrio anguillarum ATCC 19264 (MIC=2.5 µM), Vibriopenaeicida KHA (MIC=10 µM), V. harveyi ATCC 14126 (MIC=2.5 µM), V. vulnificus ATCC 33148 (MIC=5 µM), Aeromonas salmonicida NCMB 1102 (MIC=10 µM), Pseudomonas putida ATCC 12633 (MIC=40 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.12581207]10% hemolytic activity at 0.25 μM, 80% hemolytic activity at 1 μM against human erythrocytes
Sequence Information.Function: Shows hemolytic activity human red blood cells.

Literature.Title: Purification and characterization of three isoforms of chrysophsin, a novel antimicrobial peptide in the gills of the red sea bream, Chrysophrys major.
Literature.Author: Iijima N, Tanimoto N, Emoto Y, Morita Y, Uematsu K, Murakami T, Nakai T.
